hadiths.text: Narrated Aisha, Ummul Mu'minin: When I menstruated, I left the bed and lay on the reed-mat and did not approach or come near the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) until we were purified

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الرَّجُلِ يُصِيبُ مِنْهَا مَا دُونَ الْجِمَاعِ
chapter.eng-name: A Person Has Relations With Her Other Than Intercourse
